name: MERCENARY (itch) (Andrew Napierkowski)
description:
A mercenary on a secret government mission to collect stolen data protected by robot sentries. Ron Jambo is an action hero. 

But what is motivating him? Thrill chasing? Bloodthirst? Or is this just his job?...

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2019 which had the theme "What home means to you". Game takes roughly 2 min to play through fully.

Team:

Code / Art / Design  Andrew Napierkowski (@neipo13, andrewnapierkowski.com)

Music / Sound Design  Cameron Konner (@patch_bae, cameronkonner.com)

Controls:

WASD/ArrowKeys/LeftStick/DPad - Move

Z / J / A (Xbox) / Cross (PS) - Jump

X / K / X (Xbox) / Square (PS) - Shoot

(if there is an unsupported configuration that would make more sense, let me know in the comments. There is a clunky way to add/change inputs via text editor.)
